data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 1,026 believers in Saint Joseph and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Saint Joseph, Dominica
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 1,026 believers in the state of Saint Joseph.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 5 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Please, convict the 1,026 believers in Saint Joseph, Dominica to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in Saint Joseph, Dominica so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Salisbury
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Salisbury, Saint Joseph, Dominica.
Father, please raise up every one you have called in Saint Joseph, Dominica to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Saint Joseph, Dominica.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Saint Joseph, Dominica to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.
